about_the_game:
Omoikane is a Rīchi Mahjong deckbuilding game where the gods themselves are your opponents.

Starting from a standard set of 136 tiles, develop your wall into new forms to achieve impossible hands and incredible scores. Master the game through careful planning, strong intuition, and maybe just a little bit of luck.

Further details coming soon. Please consider adding Omoikane to your Wishlist to keep informed!

Minimum:

short_description: Delve into the addictive world of Rīchi Mahjong with this intense roguelike deckbuilder. Strategically build your wall with powerful tiles, navigate complex interactions, and test your skills against rule bending kami opponents. Every hand counts in this thrilling battle against entropy!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
